channel.title: Concertos of Chaos
channel.description: A Deaf Pianist Orchestrates Raw Mental Health Conversations Uncensored, Unedited, Unapologetic
channel.itunes:author: Krystifer

item.title: S01E05(Video) - "Appoggiaturas and Fermatas: When Holding On Phucks Your Harmony"
item.itunes:title: S01E05(Video) - "Appoggiaturas and Fermatas: When Holding On Phucks Your Harmony"

item.title: S01E03(Video) - Living in a New Key: Breaking Free from Life's Opus
item.itunes:title: S01E03(Video) - Living in a New Key: Breaking Free from Life's Opus
item.description: Join Brandon and me on our journey breaking free from how life tells us how we should live our lives! This drive is all over the place! Hope you can follow, and enjoy!

item.title: S01E02(Audio) Sustained!
item.itunes:title: S01E02(Audio) Sustained!
item.description: Systemic oppression sneaks up through seemingly harmless words & rules that fuck us. Just look at history: the worst started with acceptable hate that people in power gave a thumbs up to and continues to this day. When folks with influence cosign discrimination, it gives others permission to be dicks. We can't continue to let trash be normal. And yes, it absolutely fucks with your mental health!
item.content:encoded: Systemic oppression sneaks up through seemingly harmless words & rules that fuck us. Just look at history: the worst started with acceptable hate that people in power gave a thumbs up to and continues to this day. When folks with influence cosign discrimination, it gives others permission to be dicks. We can't continue to let trash be normal. And yes, it absolutely fucks with your mental health!
item.itunes:summary: Systemic oppression sneaks up through seemingly harmless words & rules that us. Just look at history: the worst started with acceptable hate that people in power gave a thumbs up to and continues to this day. When folks with influence cosign discrimination, it gives others permission to be sticks. We can't continue to let trash be normal. And yes, it absolutely phucks with your mental health!
item.itunes:author: Krystifer

item.title: S01E01(Audio) - Pilot
item.itunes:title: S01E01(Audio) - Introductory Pilot Episode
item.description: This pilot episode is meant to give a feel of my show. Bear with me as this first episode has all the mistakes in it like popping, clicking, and smacking of my mouth. :-) Gotta learn to walk before we can run! I hope you enjoy this episode!
item.content:encoded: This pilot episode is meant to give a feel of my show. Bear with me as this first episode has all the mistakes in it like popping, clicking, and smacking of my mouth. :-) Gotta learn to walk before we can run! I hope you enjoy this episode!
